item.title: FDA vs FNA
item.description: FDA or FNA? We can ask ourselves: What is the difference between a FDA and a FNA? From the class notes, we can see that the power of an automaton is mesured in the hability of accepting a language. In fact: For every FNA N, we can construct a FDA that accepts the same language, i.e: L(N) = L(M) But why do both AFD and AFN exist if we can represent the acceptance of a language in both ways?
